episode: My mom broke her wrist, so she's coming to stay with us for a few weeks while she gets better. I worry about her a lot as she's gotten older and more frail.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My mom is staying with us for a few weeks because she broke her wrist.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds challenging. How are you managing with her there?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I love having her here actually. I just hope she heals well, she's not as young as she used to be!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's sweet. I hope she recovers quickly!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Me too, sometimes I think it might be best to have her move in with us full time in a few years.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a thoughtful plan.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, she lives all alone right now, and she's pretty social. But, that can change quickly and I don't want her to get lonely.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's very considerate of you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks for that. It seems like multi-generational homes are becoming more common nowadays.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, they are!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Do you have any ideas on things I can do to make her stay with us more enjoyable?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Maybe plan some activities you both enjoy or cook her favorite meals.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's a great idea. One of her favorite dishes is Shrimp Scampi! I can make that for her.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: She'll love that!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I hope so. I'm not the best cook in the world, but I can follow a recipe pretty well.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sure it'll turn out great!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Let's hope so. How about a great idea for desert? Something Italian would be nice.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Tiramisu is a classic choice!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's the dessert with ladyfingers and coffee, right?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yes, exactly!
